dc_description_s: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:4,000,000 (E 67째--E 93째/N 38째--N 6째). Issued in slipcase: 24 x 14 x 2 cm. Title on slipcase: Map of India, shewing the civil and military stations with tales of the population and distances. Relief shown by hachures. Dedication: To Sir James Rivett Carnac Bart., chairman of the Court of Directors of the Honble. the East India Company. Prime meridian: Greenwich. Includes: table of distances, table of the area and population of Hindoostan, and distances to civil and military stations. 1 map : hand colored, dissected and mounted on linen ; 93 x 64 cm
